content: this is a free shawl pattern with an easy feather and fan lace and garter stitch it is a triangular shawl wich starts with a few stitches and increases through out the pattern size is adaptable the lace is charted only 170821 now including written instructions 220420 error in pattern there s a duplicate step 3 i have fixed that now thank you for pointing it out airyknot some of you found an error in the chart i have uploadet a new pdf sorry for the mistake and thank you szaffi82 annelisel pmck and manekko for help thank you all for kind comments **170821 maryr123 has made a great job in doing written instructions so now you can choose from charts and text thank you maryr123 you did a a good job the charts are included in the pattern and the written instructions in a separate file **
